PLANNED.description: The booking has been planned for purchase.

PENDING.description: The booking is pending for availability response from tsp. This state can be skipped depends on the tsp.

BOOKED.description: Ticket/ride reserved from tsp, waiting to go into active.

ACTIVATED.description: Booking is activated, cannot be CANCELLED, but can be ABANDONED.

CANCELLED.description: Booking is cancelled, will try to go into REFUNDING state.

REFUNDING.description: Issusing for a refund due to a CANCELLED or ABANDONED booking.

REFUNDED.description: The issued refund has been accepted and refunded.

REJECTED.description: The issued refund has been rejected.

PLANNED.description: The leg has been planned and saved.
The Itinerary has been planned and saved

ABANDONED.description: The Itinerary has been ABANDONED, one or more leg has been ABANDONED
